SQL_CASE.SQL: CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_01(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1, PARTITION PAR2 STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)));
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_02(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PAR2 STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1))) ;
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_03(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 STORAGE(NOBRANCH), PARTITION PAR2) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_04(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) PARTITIONS 5 STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_05(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PAR2 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR)) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_06(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PAR2 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_07(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1, PARTITION PAR2 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_08(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PAR2) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T1_STORAGE_09(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY HASH(C1) (PARTITION PAR1, PARTITION PAR2) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T2_STORAGE_01(C1 INT,C2 INT) PARTITION BY RANGE(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 VALUES LESS THAN(5),PARTITION PAR2 VALUES LESS THAN(100) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)));
CREATE TABLE T2_STORAGE_02(C1 INT,C2 INT) PARTITION BY RANGE(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 VALUES LESS THAN(5),PARTITION PAR2 VALUES LESS THAN(100)) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T2_STORAGE_03(C1 INT,C2 INT) PARTITION BY RANGE(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 VALUES LESS THAN(5),PARTITION PAR2 VALUES LESS THAN(100) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR)) STORAGE(NOBRANCH);
CREATE TABLE T2_STORAGE_04(C1 INT,C2 INT) PARTITION BY RANGE(C1) (PARTITION PAR1 VALUES LESS THAN(5),PARTITION PAR2 VALUES LESS THAN(100) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_01(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1),(C2)) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_02(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)),(C2));
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_03(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR),(C2) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)));
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_04(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR),(C2)) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_05(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR),(C2)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T3_STORAGE_06(C1 INT,C2 INT,C3 INT) PARTITION BY COLUMN((C1),(C2)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_01(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4));
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_02(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1)), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_03(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4)) STORAGE(BRANCH(1,1));
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_04(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4)) STORAGE(NOBRANCH);
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_05(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
CREATE TABLE T4_STORAGE_06(C1 INT, C2 INT) PARTITION BY LIST(C1) (PARTITION PARLIST1 VALUES(1,2), PARTITION PARLIST2 VALUES(3,4)) STORAGE(CLUSTERBTR);
